alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 08 at 11:40AM PST until December 11 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult-to-impossible and dangerous. Blowing snow may result in visibility reductions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An incoming system is expected to bring moderate-to-heavy snow to the Sheep Range and Spring Mountains this weekend. Gusty winds may result in blowing snow and reduced visibility; making travel hazardous.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
